titleStmt.title: A ievvell for the eare. By Ro. Wilkinson
Sermon of hearing, or, jewell for the eare
titleStmt.author: Wilkinson, Robert, Dr. in Divinity.

notesStmt.note: Another edition of STC 25652.5, published in 1593 with title: A sermon of hearing, or, jewell for the eare.
Copy at reel 2088 has printing device and imprint cut out of title page.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
